description: Welcome to Place Laval – a beautifully kept townhome community in the heart of historic Maillardville! This bright and spacious 3 bedroom + 2.5 bath home offers 1360 sq.ft. of comfortable living with 353sf crawl space as storage. The main level features an open living & dining area with natural light. Enjoy a private fenced patio perfect for morning coffee or evening BBQs. 2nd floor is a primary suite with double closets and a full ensuite. 3rd Floor find two generous bedrooms with a full bathroom. Conveniently located within walking distance to Mackin Park, schools, shopping, cafés, and easy access to Hwy 1 and SkyTrain. Perfect for first-time buyers, young families.
